article_title: Live Roundup: Samsung Unveils the Galaxy S5 Phone
article_text:
Samsung’s new Galaxy S5 phone is due in April. The Wall Street Journal

Samsung Electronics, the world’s biggest smartphone maker, faces competition from all sides these days. At the highest end of the market, of course, sits Apple and its iPhone, while at the lower end of the market, a horde of Chinese smartphone makers are quickly catching up to Samsung, at a time when smartphones increasingly resemble one another.

Those are the challenges Samsung faces as it is unveils the latest iteration of its best-selling smartphone, the Samsung Galaxy S5. The company also released its latest smartwatch, the Gear 2, and a fitness-tracking device called the Gear Fit.

Read on for highlights at Samsung’s Unpacked Event, which took place at Mobile World Congress in Barcelona, an annual confab that serves as the biggest stage for the world’s smartphone makers.

twitter.description: Follow along live as Samsung shows off its newest phone and other products at the Mobile World Congress conference in Barcelona.
twitter.title: Live Roundup: Samsung Unveils the Galaxy S5 Phone
